inn1.comm: the first ball is fullish around off stump, Marsh stays in his crease and plays the ball towards mid-off
full length but the line is wide outside off, Marsh lets the ball go and it shoots through to the wicketkeeper
good length outside off stump, Marsh lets it go and the ball dies and bounces a second time before reaching Dhiman Ghosh
the short of a length ball bounces a bit more this time and tucks up Marsh as he tries to play the ball on the leg side
good length delivery angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, Marsh tries to run the ball down to third man but gets an inside edge on to the pad

that's streaky but Australia are away! Marsh sees a bit of width outside off stump and tries to play the big drive through the off side, he plays away from his body and the outside edge flies wide of the two-man slip cordon to the third-man boundary
Shahadat pitches on a good length outside off and seams the ball away from the right-hander, Watson stays in his crease and lets the ball go, it bounces twice before reaching the keeper
fantastic ball, the fullish length draws Watson into the front-foot drive just outside off stump, the ball pitches and seams away from the right-hander to beat the bat
and again! The angle from Shahadat into the right-hander forces Watson to play at the ball, it pitches around off stump and seams past Watson's front-foot defence
the length is shorter this time and Watson is able to stay on the back foot and defend on the off side
that's superbly hit, the ball was short but the bounce was on the lower side, Watson stayed low, swiveled, and pulled the ball along the ground through midwicket for four
the length is better and the line of on off and middle, Shahadat delivered that with his trademark grunt, Watson gets behind the line and blocks, these two haven't done much running so far
Mortaza slants the good-length ball across the right-hander, Marsh stays in his crease and lets it pass
the length is a bit short just outside off stump, Marsh moves back in a flash and cuts the ball in front of point, it won't reach the boundary though
poor line, just a bit too straight, Watson moves back and flicks the ball off his pads towards long leg
good leave, Marsh moves across his crease, covers the line of his off stump, and shoulders arms to one that slants close to off stump
this one is shorter and wider and much easier to leave, Marsh rehearsed the cut after the ball passed, he was thinking about it
good length but the line is on leg stump, Marsh tries to work it off his hips but gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye behind square
Shahadat pitches the ball full on middle stump, Marsh moves forward and clips the ball off his pads towards midwicket
smashing shot! The length is a bit full and Marsh strides forward to drive the ball powerfully straight past the bowler for four
the line is on leg stump and Marsh tries to work the ball off his pads, he was too early on the shot though and missed
fuller length on middle stump, Marsh drives the ball off the front foot towards mid-on, Shahadat is getting the ball to move into the left-hander
Marsh tries to whip a good length ball through midwicket off the front foot but gets an inside edge on to the pad
short of a length on leg stump, Marsh moves quickly on to the back foot and nudges the ball wide of the fielder at short fine leg
Mortaza pitches on a testing length just outside off and moves the ball across the left-hander, Marsh stays in his crease and doesn't play a shot
this one is much closer to off stump but Marsh shows excellent judgement in moving across his stumps and shouldering arms
this time the line is too straight to leave and Marsh gets behind the line off and a good length ball and defends towards point
good length just outside off stump, Marsh opens the face and guides the ball towards third man
short of a length outside off stump, Watson stands on the back foot and punches the ball towards cover

Mortaza pitched the ball outside off stump and cut it back into the right-hander, Watson was caught by surprise and stopped his shot once he saw the ball moving into him, it hit the bottom edge and ran towards fine leg, that was extremely close to the stumps

Just the one slip in place now. Shahadat pitches the ball on a good length and moves it across the left-hander, Marsh gets squared up while defending and the outside edge flies wide of first slip, that would have bounced short of second slip had there been one

dropped! And that too by the fielder who was just placed at silly mid-off! Marsh tried to drive on the up off the front foot but the ball stopped on him and he hit it in the air towards silly mid-off where Kapali got both hands to the ball at head height but just couldn't hang on
played through the backward-point region for two more
strays down leg side this time and that will be the first wide of the match
short of a length on off stump, Marsh cuts off the back foot and calls for the single, Watson initially says no but sets off once the point fielder fails to stop the ball
full ball angling into middle stump, Watson moves forward and across to drive the ball towards mid-on
Shahadat pitches on a good length outside off and seams the ball away from Watson who waits on the back foot and lets it go
Marsh tries to play a forceful cut to a short of a length delivery outside off and gets a bottom edge into the ground
once again he tries to cut and once again he bottom-edges it into the ground towards point, Marsh is just struggling to find his timing
tight line and length just outside off stump, Marsh lets it go through to Dhiman Ghosh
there's a bit of width outside off stump and Marsh goes hard at the ball, cutting it in the air down to third man, that was more of a top edge
Mortaza angles the ball into the right-hander and Watson turns the ball off the back foot through square leg
that's a bit slower from Mortaza just outside off stump, Marsh moves back in his crease, waits for the ball, and opens the face to steer it towards third man
too full outside off and Marsh cashes in, he strides forward, drives the ball firmly, and places it wide of the fielder at mid-off
better length just outside off stump, Marsh watches the ball closely and lets it go
Marsh tries to cut the ball through point but gets cramped for room by the movement into him, he gets a bottom edge that bounces near his shoes
he didn't control that shot, the length was on the shorter side and Marsh went on the back foot to pull, one hand came off the bat as he connected and the ball fell safely in the outfield
Watson opens the face and guides the ball towards third man

that was close to the fielder at silly mid-off, Marsh moved forward to a fullish ball and drove it in the air between the bowler and the fielder at silly mid-off, Kapali dived to his left but couldn't reach the ball, Marsh had struck it hard, he's taking his chances is Marsh

he's bowled him! Reza strikes with his first ball of the series, what a start! Reza pitches the ball on a good length just around off stump and nips it a fraction back into the left-hander, Marsh pushes forward in defence with a large gap between bat and pad, Reza finds it and the ball hits off stump, Marsh has monopolised the strike and ridden his luck so far but it's run out now
left alone outside off stump
this one is wider outside off stump, Clarke lets it go again
Reza pitches the ball on off and skids it into the right-hander, Clarke tries to work it off his pads but misses
that's far too wide outside off stump, he will have to re-bowl that one
good length and the line is closer to off stump, Clarke strides forward and shoulders arms
Reza persists with the wide line outside off, Clarke patiently lets the ball go again
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
good length from Shahadat outside off stump, Watson stays on the back foot and drives the ball towards point
the length is a bit shorter and the line is angling into middle stump, Watson moves back and flicks the ball through midwicket
Clarke leans forward to a full ball that angles into him and pushes it towards mid-on
Clarke moves across in his crease and uses the angle of the short of a length ball into him to work it behind square
good length delivery on off stump to finish the over, Watson moves forward and defends towards point
Clarke moves across his stumps and flicks the ball off his pads towards deep backward square leg
Reza compensates by bowling wide outside off stump, Clarke lets it go
defended off the front foot towards cover
good length from Reza, angling into off stump, Clarke defends on the front foot towards the off side
that's extremely wide outside off stump, Clarke reaches out for it but the ball is just too far away
Clarke reaches out to cut a wide out once again but gets a thick outside edge past first slip towards third man, there's another slip standing at a wide third slip
defended on the off side
good length delivery outside off stump, Watson lets it go through to Ghosh
full length and the ball angles into the right-hander, Watson tries to drive but gets more of a thick inside edge through midwicket
Mortaza gets the ball to lift off a good length outside off, Clarke strides forward and lets it go
Clarke moves forward once again and shoulders arms to a good length ball outside off
Clarke comes forward and uses the angle into him to play the ball towards midwicket
tight line and length on off and middle stump, Clarke moves forward and defends towards the bowler
Watson stays in his crease and defends a good length ball which slants into him, the ball moves away just a fraction off the pitch and the thick outside edge goes behind point
Clarke lets one that moves away from him go past off stump
Clarke strides forward and defends towards cover
short of a length outside off stump, Clarke moves towards the ball but lets it go in the end
fuller ball which angles into the right-hander, Clarke leans forward and clips the ball off his pads to Ashraful at midwicket
short of a length outside off, the ball angles into the right-hander, Clarke stays on the back foot and lets it pass
good length just outside off stump, Watson moves forward and cuts the ball towards point

Watson cuts loose, the length is a bit full and he lofts the ball off the front foot over wide mid-on, he hit that from outside off stump, Tamim gives chase and dives desperately but can't save the boundary
Watson drives firmly on the up towards mid-off where there's a bit of a fumble
short of a length on middle stump, Watson jumps back and whips the ball off his pads towards deep square leg
Clarke moves across his crease and defends a short of a length ball which angles into him towards midwicket
Clarke strides forward and opens the face to push a good length ball into the gap between point and cover point for a single
short of a length outside off stump, Clarke drives the ball off the back foot towards point, he's not hitting the gaps in the infield
defended solidly off the front foot towards point, the length was fuller this time
Clarke leans across his stumps and flicks the ball towards deep backward square leg, the line was on middle and leg stump from Reza
full ball on middle stump, Reza was looking for the yorker, Watson pushes it towards mid-on and sprints the quick single
Reza pitches the ball on a good length outside off stump and moves the ball into Clarke to cramp him for room, Clarke defends on the back foot
wider line and fuller length, Clarke moves forward but mis-times the drive on the off side
bowled flat through the air on middle stump, Watson drives towards mid-on for the single
tossed up on off and middle, Clarke prods at the ball with no footwork and gets an  inside edge through square leg
Watson moves deep in his crease to one outside off and cuts to point
Watson moves back and across, waits for the ball to angle into him, and opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
that's too short and I suspect Watson tried to hit it too hard, he moved back to pull and got an inside edge on to his leg
defended on the back foot on the leg side
Clarke's edginess continues, he tries to dab the ball towards third man without moving his feet and the movement into him induces the inside edge past his stumps
beaten! Clarke pushes forward to defend a fuller ball which pitches on off stump and seams just a fraction past Clarke's outside edge, the Bangladesh players think he's edged it
driven firmly off the front foot towards mid-off
good length delivery just outside off stump, Clarke moves back and drives towards mid-off
this time Clarke stands on the front foot and drives the ball through cover, the outfield is on the slower side
Watson waits for a good length ball to angle into him and opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
Watson moves back and towards off stump to cut a flat delivery towards short third man
Watson moves forward this time and then waits for a slower and more flighted delivery to reach him before playing it to short third man
cut towards point
a fraction short and Watson moves back to pull, he didn't time it well
full ball on off stump, Clarke drives off the front foot towards cover
Clarke moves back and drives towards long-off for a single to end the over
bowled flat and straight, defended on the off side off side off the back foot
Clarke strides forward and lets one that pitches around off stump spin across him
played off the back foot towards cover
Razzak draws Clarke forward with his length and turns the ball away from the right-hander, Clarke defends on the off side
slightly shorter in length and Clarke cuts off the back foot past point
Watson defends back to the bowler with bat close to front pad
Shakib gives Clarke width outside off stump and he cuts towards the fielder on the point boundary
bowled flatter, fuller and straighter, Watson defends on the front foot
pulled through midwicket for another single
Clarke strides forward to a quick delivery and drives towards the bowler
Shakib slips in the straighter one and Clarke moves back to play the ball on the leg side
tight line and length on off stump, Clarke pushes the ball towards the vacant mid-off region, extra cover can't cut it off and they get a single
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
short and wide outside off stump, Clarke cuts off the back foot towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
Watson stays in his crease to a full ball and works it off his pads towards square leg
flat and full on middle and leg stump, Clarke moves forward to play the ball towards midwicket
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
the quicker ball is a bit short on off stump, giving Clarke enough to to move back and cut through cover point
Shakib angles the ball into the right-hander with a round-arm action, Clarke defends towards the bowler
Clarke works the ball behind square for  a single
Watson strides forward to defend and gets a thick inside edge on to the front pad, Shakib appeals for lbw
pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
bowled quickly through the air outside off, Clarke thrusts his pad outside the line of off stump and pads the ball away
fuller and slower outside off, Clarke drives towards long-off on the front foot
Razzak drops short and spins the ball away from the right-hander, giving Clarke room to cut towards the boundary
played towards point
Watson moves back in his crease and cuts the ball hard towards the fielder in the deep
Clarke lets the ball go, that pitched close to off stump and turned away from the right-hander
pushed towards the right of the fielder at mid-on for a single

huge appeal for leg before! Watson went back to a flat and quicker ball and tried to work it off his pads through the leg side, he missed and got hit on the pad, that looked close, that pitched on leg stump, and hit him in front of middle stump, that's plumb, absolutely plumb but umpire Saheba says not out
bowled full on middle stump, driven off the front foot through midwicket
pushed towards midwicket
defended towards cover on the front foot
defended on the front foot, Clarke came down the track and adjusted his shot

Watson's gone now! Clarke pushed the ball slowly off the front foot towards mid-on and called for the single, Watson was hesitant, Clarke powered through for the run but Watson's response was late, Mortaza picked up and threw towards the batsman's end where Dhiman Ghosh broke the stumps with Watson miles short
he gets off the mark by pulling a shorter ball off the back foot towards deep square leg
bowled flat through the air from over the wicket, hussey moves back an defends on the leg side
Hussey moves back and nudges the ball off his pads towards short fine leg
tossed up on middle stump, Hussey moves forward and defends to the bowler
Hussey uses the angle into him to hit the ball towards midwicket
bowled quickly through the air on off stump, defended off the back foot towards the off
Hussey stays back and plays the ball towards point, that's the first maiden over of the innings
Clarke comes down the track to loft the ball over the leg side but gets a thick outside edge over extra cover, the ball falls safely past the in-field
defended on the front foot on the leg side

another mix-up and another run-out! Clarke pushes the ball off the front foot towards cover point, he begins to go for the single but hesitates, he sees Hussey coming and continues to run, Kapali runs in from point, picks the ball up cleanly and scores a direct hit at the bowler's end, no need for the third umpire, Clarke's struggle is over
defended on the front foot
pushed through midwicket for a single
David moves back and defends towards the bowler
tossed up on off stump, Michael moves forward and uses the angle into him to drive the ball through the gap at midwicket
defended on the back foot towards midwicket
David moves on to the back foot and plays the ball towards point
defended to the bowler on the back foot
David moves out of his crease and hits the ball towards the fielder at midwicket
bowled fuller and slower through the air, David strides forward and blocks
bowled flat through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
David gets on to the front foot and drives a flat ball through cover for one more
short of a length and outside off stump, Michael waits on the back foot and plays the ball to cover
pushed off the front foot back towards the bowler
bowled quickly through the air outside off stump, Michael stays in his crease and defends
David moves on to the back foot and cuts a flat ball through cover for a single
pushed off the front foot into the gap at cover point
tossed up on middle stump, driven towards mid-on
bowled slowly through the air on middle and leg, David moves back and defends towards the bowler
David moves back to cut but can't beat short third man
defended towards cover, the overs are zipping by now
flat ball on off stump, defended on the back foot
too straight this time and Michael works it off his pads towards the leg side
played towards the bowler off the back foot
David leans forward and drives the ball towards wide mid-on

that's a risky single! Michael pushes the ball with soft hands towards cover point and calls for the single, David responds without hesitation, Michael sprints down the pitch but the fielder gets to the ball extremely quickly, he throws the ball at the bowler's end but misses, a direct hit and Michael would have been short
played through midwicket for a single
pushed off the back foot to mid-on
David comes down the track, Razzak sees him coming and spins the shorter ball away from the right-hander, David tries to pull from wide outside off but mis-times it
played towards mid on
played through midwicket for one more
tossed up on off stump, Michael moves forward and defends towards square leg
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the off side
David moves back and across and works a flat ball through square leg, he hit that from offstump
Michael leans forward and drives a flighted ball to cover
defended on the leg side off the front foot
Michael leans forward and paddles the ball towards fine leg to bring up Australia's 100, it's taken them a while to get there
bowled flat and straight, Michael defends on the front foot
defended solidly with bat close to front pad
good length angling into off stump, driven off the front foot through cover
good length on middle and off stump, Michael stays on the back foot and defends towards point
width offered outside off stump, and Michael stays on the back foot and cuts the ball hard through point
driven off the front foot to cover

quick single taken, Michael drops the ball with soft hands just behind the stumps and calls his brother through for the single, David responds and makes his ground even though Dhiman reaches the ball and hits the stumps direct
short of a length outside off, driven off the back foot towards cover
tossed up on off stump, driven back to the bowler
full toss on off stump, David moves forward and hits the ball through midwicket, there's a fielder in the deep
Michael sweeps the ball towards short fine leg, more of a top edge but it falls safe
driven off the front foot towards midwicket
bowled flatter through the air outside off stump, Michael moves back and cuts towards point
Michael steps out of the crease and plays the ball towards midwicket
Reza pitches on a good length and angles the ball into the right-hander, David drives off the front foot through cover
fuller length on middle and off, Michael strides forward and drives towards cover, both batsman looking fluent against the medium-pacer
driven off the front foot towards mid-off, Michael calls for the quick single

that's the third run out! Fantastic fielding! David charges down the track and hits the short of  a length ball hard towards mid-off with a flat bat, he sets off for the single immediately but the ball was travelling towards mid-off quickly, Ashraful sprints towards it, picks up, and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end, umpire Saheba calls for the third umpire but David isn't waiting, he's walking off
Hussey waits on the back foot and plays the ball towards point
played towards midwicket for a single, he will keep strike
too full outside off stump, Hussey leans forward and drives through cover to the fielder in the deep
good length delivery slanting across the left-hander from over the wicket, Hussey opens the face and plays the ball to point
driven off the front foot through cover for a single
bowled full, nearly into the block hole, Haddin stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Shahadat's radar's gone haywire, he sprays the ball wide down leg side, Dhiman has no chance, that's the first boundary since the 14th over, five wides, terrible ball
cut off the back foot towards third man
good length delivery angling across the left-hander from just outside off stump, Hussey lets it go
driven on the front foot towards cover
good length on off stump, Haddin stays in his crease, gets behind the line, and defends on the off side
defended back towards the bowlers on the back foot

Haddin defends the ball back to the bowler, Reza fields and throws the ball back at the batsman's end, Haddin has his back turned and the ball strikes his bat, he looks for the single but Hussey says no
Haddin mis-times the shot to mid-off which allows him to complete the quick single
the slower ball on off stump, Hussey moves forward and defends on the off side
Haddin steps out to a flat ball and defends towards the off side
this time Haddin stays in his crease and plays the ball back to the bowler
Haddin tries to drive but can't get it away, he hits it to the bowler
played towards point for a quick single
driven off the front foot towards long-on
flat ball on middle and off stump, played off the back foot towards the off side
Hussey moves back and works a flat ball off his pads towards midwicket
bowled flat through the air on off and middle, Haddin walks across his crease and plays the ball through square leg
tossed up on off stump, Hussey moves forward and drives the ball towards long-on for a single
Haddin moves outside the line of off stump and dabs a flat ball towards third man
Hussey moves back and pushes the ball with soft hands towards midwicket for another single
cut off the back foot towards short third man
Hussey moves forward and pushes the ball towards midwicket for a single
Haddin stays on his crease and defends towards midwicket
he's hit that nicely, Haddin uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and drives firmly down the ground
pulled towards midwicket for a single
Haddin comes out of his crease but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, he defends on the off side
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Hussey comes down the pitch, Mortaza sees him coming and shortens his length, Hussey ends up defending
played with soft hands towards point for a quick single
Haddin comes out of his crease to hit the ball through the off side, the length is short and he can't beat the infield

tight line and length on off stump, Haddin pushes the ball towards mid-off and sprints for the single, the fielder at mid-off hits the stumps direct at the bowler's end but Haddin dives full length to make his crease
played behind point off the back foot or a single
Haddin moves back in his crease and plays the ball towards midwicket, he sets off for the single and loses his bat as he reaches the non-striker's end
Haddin comes out of his crease but gets beaten in the flight, he tries to work the ball on the leg side but gets hit on the pad
played towards long on for a single
there's the boundary! The first since the 14th over! Hussey fishes out the reverse sweep and hits the ball from outside off stump past short third man
Hussey nudges the ball on the leg side for a single
Haddin takes a step forward and pushes the ball towards the off side, Razzak moves to his left and dives but the ball gets past him to allow the batsmen to run the single
bowled flat through the air on off stump, Hussey defends on the back foot
Haddin's having a crack now, he charges and backs away to the leg side to create enough width to cut the ball through backward point for four
driven off the front foot to long on for a single
Hussey comes forward and pushes a good length ball towards long off
Haddin misses out on a full toss on middle and leg stump, he stays in his crease and hits it to midwicket
the slower ball on middle stump, Haddin stays in his crease and plays it to midwicket
short of a length on middle stump, Haddin comes forward and tries to play the ball on the leg side, he doesn't make proper contact but gets a single, Australia reach 150

caught! Haddin's hit it straight to cover! He backs away to make room to hit over the off side, the flighted delivery dips and turns away from the right-hander, Haddin ends up driving away from his body and chips an easy catch to Kapali
White strides forward to a flat ball on off and middle and defends
White moves forward once again and defends

what a terrific ball! It was flighted on middle stump and drew White forward, the ball beat him in flight and spun past the outside edge of his front-foot defence, Dhiman whipped off the bails but White's toe was grounded
swept behind square and White's off the mark
nudged towards square leg off the front foot for a quick single
Hussey gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball powerfully in front of square to the fielder in the deep
Dhiman appeals for a catch, Shakib spun a flat ball past the outside edge of White's forward defence
White plants his front foot forward and has a mighty slog across the line, he gets beaten by one that keeps low
defended on the front foot towards the off side
White tries to defend on the front foot but the ball once again spins away from the right-hander and beats the bat
swept down towards long log
White moves his front foot outside the line of off stump and tries to sweep, he misses and gets hit on the pad, Razzak appeals but that was missing off
cut off the back foot towards point
bowled flat, fast and short by Razzak, White plays the paddle shot towards deep backward square leg
Hussey gets on to the front foot and nudges the ball towards cover point for a single
tossed up on middle and off stump, White lunges forward and blocks
loud appeal for lbw as White misses the sweep, he got hit on the pad and the ball went towards the off side
full ball on off stump, Hussey drives off the front foot to long-off
he's smashed that! White backs away to make a bit of room, gets under a length ball, and pulls it high and far over deep midwicket, that's the first six of the innings
he's stepping on it now, White lofts another length ball powerfully towards wide long-on, the ball bounces just inside the boundary
White tries to hit another ball down the ground by backing away but gets an inside edge on the leg side
bowled full into the block hole, excellent ball, Hussey can't do much but defend on the off side
full ball outside off stump, Hussey moves toward leg and hits the ball towards long-on
Hussey moves forward and towards leg to make room, Mortaza bowls it in the block hole, Hussey squeezes it out towards third man

dropped, White backs away and hits the ball flat towards long-on, he didn't quite get under the ball and therefore didn't get the elevation, Reza runs in and dives forward but can't hold on, how costly will that prove?
Hussey backs away and lofts the ball over wide mid-on, the ball falls safely in the outfield
the low full toss on middle stump, White backs away towards leg and drives the ball towards point for a single
excellent ball, right up there in the block hole, Hussey plays towards midwicket for one more
the full length doesn't give White the necessary space to free his arms, he ends up driving towards long-on
Reza keeps it right up in the block hole, White can't get under that, he pushes the ball back towards the non-striker, Reza tries to stop it with his boot but fails
Hussey steps out to a low full toss and drives the ball through extra cover, the long-off fielder moves quickly to his right to prevent the second

White drives the ball hard back at the bowler who stops it with the boot, the ball bounces towards cover and the batsmen run the single, Ashraful hits the stumps at the batsman's end and they run the extra run off the rebound
White backs away to hit the ball down the ground but gets an inside edge that falls near his boot, they run another quick single
Reza bowls it in the block hole and Hussey plays it towards the off side, Reza limps as he runs across to field, he has a problem either with his knee or ankle
full ball and Hussey drives towards long-off for a single
Hussey charges down the track and swings a full toss towards wide long-on, he was cramped for room as he played the shot
he steps out of his crease once again and drives a fuller ball towards long-off for one more, over to White
White moves back in his crease to alter the length of a full ball, he gets under it and chips the ball in the air towards long-on, the ball falls well short of the fielder on the boundary

he's clobbered that! Hussey walks down the track and pulls a length ball with brute force over the deep midwicket boundary, the ball bounces off the roof of the stand, Hussey reaches his fifty with that shot
the line is down leg side and Dhiman does superbly to dive to his right and make the save
full ball and Hussey drives down the ground, he's hit it straight enough, if not hard enough, to run two
poor end to the innings from Bangladesh, Mortaza bowls a full toss, Hussey moves across his stumps to get inside the line and paddles the ball past short fine leg for four

inn2.comm: Bracken lands it on a good length outside off and Tamim lets it go through to Haddin
full length outside off stump, Tamim moves forward and drives the ball through the gap at cover,. the ball pulls up on the slow outfield
good length delivery outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
Tamim gets behind the line of a good length ball on off stump and defends back towards the bowler
excellent line and length outside off stump, Tamim moves forward and shoulders arms to a delivery which moves away from him
Clark pitches on a good length on off stump and seams the ball across the left-hander, the batsman tries to defend on the front foot and gets beaten
Siddique gets behind the line and defends towards the off side on the back foot
Clark sends down a bouncer and Siddique ducks under it
good length delivery pitches in line with the stumps and angles across the left-hander, Siddique defends on the front foot
Clark's given nothing away so far, perfect line and length, Siddique moves forward and defends with a straight bat towards the off side

that's a nasty delivery and Siddique's been caught! Clark banged the ball in short and it rose sharply on the left-hander, Siddique was caught in an awkward position and he fended at the ball to stop it from hitting him, the ball hit the glove and lobbed up over the wicketkeeper, White dived to his right and took the catch behind Haddin
defended on the front foot towards the off side
full and wide outside off stump, Tamim sees the width and tries to play the booming drive through cover, the ball moves away from the bat and beats the batsman
played off the pads behind square for a single
good length delivery on leg and middle, Ashraful moves across and defends towards the leg side
Bracken strays on to leg stump and Ashraful leans across to whip the ball off his pads towards fine leg
short and wide outside off stump, Tamim tries to cut off the back foot but the movement away from him takes the ball even wider
good length delivery outside off stump, Tamim strides forward and lets the ball go
the full ball outside off stump swings away from Ashraful who chases it and slashes the ball through backward point, that was in the air, third man runs to his right and fields
Ashraful tries to force a short of a length ball through the off side but gets a bottom edge into the ground
Clark hits a good length on off stump, Ashraful stays in his crease, gets behind the line, and defends towards the bowler
short of a length outside off stump, Ashraful tries to play the ball towards third man but gets beaten by the extra bounce
Clark pitches the ball on a good length just outside off and moves the ball into the right-hander, Ashraful pushes forward and gets an inside edge on to the pad

dropped, the ball is short of a length and wide outside off stump, Ashraful reached out for it and crashed the drive straight to Hopes at cover point, the ball went to him at stomach height and he couldn't hold on, he tried to catch the rebound but that was out of his reach, the ball was struck hard but the catch was relatively simple
short ball outside off stump, Tamim gets under it and cuts the ball high over point for four, he does play that shot well but it's a risky one
defended towards backward point
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Tamim moves back and works a delivery that angles into him through midwicket
Tamim moves back and across to defend a good length ball with a straight bat
tight line and length on off stump, Tamim defends off the front foot towards the off side

Ashraful takes another chance but this time he's been caught! The ball was a little wide outside off stump and Ashraful drove hard at it, he tried to hit through cover but sliced it towards point where Clarke took a sharp catch above his head, that ball was travelling fast, Ashraful's loss is a massive blow to Bangladesh's chances
short of a length delivery on the stump, Kapali defends on the back foot
Kapali gets cramped for room and nudges a good length ball which angles into him behind square
flicked off the pads behind square
Clark bangs in another bouncer and forces Tamim to take evasive action
tight line and length on middle stump, played towards midwicket for a single
width offered outside off stump and Tamim drives the ball with power through the infield, he hit that on the front foot through cover point
fuller ball on middle stump, played off the pads towards midwicket

bowled him! The length wasn't short at all and the line was on middle and off, Kapali attempted to pull the ball but was in a hopeless position, the ball skidded past his bat and hit the top of off stump, he looked at the pitch on his way back but the length wasn't short enough to pull
the good length ball rears up at Shakib who defends on the off side, he took one hand off the bat to keep that one down

that's a crazy shot, the ball is short, wide and quick outside off stump and Shakib tried to pull it through midwicket, the ball hit the top edge and flew all the way down to third man for a one-bounce four, rather rash considering the circumstances
Shakib plays a firm drive but can't beat the in-field at cover
Clark angles the ball across the left-hander, giving Tamim room for the drive, Tamim moves forward and throws his bat at the ball but doesn't make contact
Tamim strides forward and drives a good length ball towards mid-off
Clark pitches the ball short of a length and slants it across the left-hander, Tamim lets it go
pushed towards midwicket for a quick single
short of a length delivery just outside off stump, Shakib tries to cut but mis-times it
Clark strays down leg side, and that's a wide
Shakib gets on top of the bounce of a short of a length ball and cuts towards point
a low full toss and the batsman drives off the front foot past mid-off, that hasn't been timed though
too straight from Johnson this time and Tamim whips the ball off his pads towards long leg
Johnson pitches on a good length on off stump, Shakib moves forward and defends towards the bowler
Johnson pitches the ball on middle and strays down leg side, Shakib misses the leg glance but that's a wide
Johnson gives Shakib room outside off and Shakib drills the cover drive between cover and mid-off for four, superbly timed
defended on the back foot this time

massive appeal for lbw but umpire Saheba says not out,  Johnson pitched the ball short of a length close to off stump, Shakib tried to cut but was cramped for room and beaten, there was a big noise as the ball passed the bat, Haddin was confident that he had caught it off the bat
short and wide outside off stump, Tamim chases it and tries to upper cut the ball, he gets beaten by the bounce
full ball on off stump, Tamim tries to smash it down the ground but gets an inside edge towards fine leg
short of a length on middle and leg, Shakib jumps on to the back foot and tucks the ball behind square
Clark pushes Shakib deep into his crease with a short ball, the batsman defends awkwardly on the leg side
fuller length on middle and off stump, Shakib moves forward and defends towards the bowler
the length isn't short enough to pull but Shakib manages to place it between midwicket and mid-on
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
driven off the front foot towards long off
Hussey bowls a flat ball angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, the batsman defends on the front foot
played back towards the bowler
bowled full into the blockhole, Tamim defends back to the bowler
full ball outside off stump, Tamim tries to drive through the off side but misses
Short, width provided and Shakib lashes that to point for a boundary

similar delivery, this time Shakib slaps it high towards wide third man, where Shane Watson seemed to have taken a superb jumping catch after running back, but he couldn't hold on to it when he landed on the ground
another cut, no run this time
goes for another big cut, closer to his body, flashes over the slips for a boundary
this is turning out to be an over full of cut shots, this goes straight to cover
defended to the leg side
full ball, dug out to the offside
worked away towards backward point
flighted and pitched up, driven back to the bowler, who misfields to give away a run
full ball on the stumps, driven down to long-off
full toss outside off, tries to smash that but doesn't quite get hold of it and it goes towards point where Johnson fields
full and hit towards cover
short delivery, played off the back foot to cover for a single
sliding towards leg this time, Shakib shuffles across and helps it towards square leg
good delivery, in the channel, back of a length and watchfully defended
length ball outside off, Tamim comes down the ground and whacks it over mid-off, races away for a boundary
that was homing in on his toes, and he flicks it between mid-on and  midwicket
cramped the batsman for room, back of a length on off, played towards point off the back foot
dances down the track and tries to flay it down the ground, the fielder at mid-off manages to get a hand on that
tries a late cut, but that bounce more than he expected and he misses it
on off stump and Tamim tries a cute dab, runs away to third man
SHOT! short ball and he moves across the stumps and gets on top of the bounce and swats it wide of the fielder at short fine leg
defended on the backfoot
flicked away nicely towards midwicket, superbly fielded by Nathan Bracken at deep square leg
slapped to cover .another good bit of fielding, This time by Hopes at cover
short ball, angling across the batsman, batsman just drops it behind sqaure on the off and runs
defended on the front foot
slower ball, short and on leg stump, played with soft hands and the batsmen think of a single but decide against it
shortish on the legs, turned behind square for a single
shortish ball, played off the pads to deep backward square leg

Close call for Tamim there. He went for a big swipe, failed to make contact, and lost his bat. Haddin collects the ball and breaks the stumps. Third umpire's decision is asked, but Tamim was back in time
run down to third man for a single
Shakib goes! an attempted pull balloons in the air and Michael Hussey at midwicket  takes an easy catch
flicked to midwicket for a single
cut to point and another single
hit firmly to mid-off, there was a fumble but batsmen decided not to go for a single, so Tamim's fifty will have to wait
on a good length, gets behind the line of the ball and defends
gets to his fifty this time, played with soft hands to the off side and they scamper through
quick delivery, fullish on middle and off, defended watchfully by Mahmudullah
on a length outside off, driven firmly but straight to cover
slower ball, back of a length, goes past the outside edge
Smash! Tamim isn't going to slow down just because Shakib has gone. pulled towards wide long-on. One bounce over the boundary
And again! better this time, length ball, gets his foot out of the way and hits through the line over the bowler's head for six
played off the pads behind square on the leg side
on a length outside off, goes for the drive and is beaten
Mahmudullah goes. Bowled by an incutter. on a length, he tried to defend off the front foot, went through the gap between bat and pad. Might have been an inside edge as it crashes into middle stump
back of a length, just outside off, defended off the back foot
Slower, short ball outside leg, Tamim was early on the shot as he tried to help it to fine leg.
defended towards the leg side
back of a length, angling across the batsman, tried to dab it to point and though of a single but wisely didn't go for it
slower ball, on a length thuds into his pads, Watson appeals but that pitched outside leg
on a length, just outside off, glided behind square on the off
firm drive, but it doesn't beat mid-off
short of a length delivery pitches outside off and angles into the right-hander, the batsman defends on the back foot

that's plumb, absolutely plumb, Hopes pitches the ball on a good length outside off stump and angles the ball into middle, Dhiman should have been playing forward and straight, instead he stays back in his crease and plays across the line, attempting to hit the ball towards midwicket, he misses and gets struck on the knee roll in front of middle
good length on off stump, Reza strides forward and defends with a straight bat
short of a length outside off stump, Reza stays in his crease and lets it go through to Haddin
Reza presses forward once again and shoulders arms to a good length ball that goes past the off stump
good length on off stump, Reza stays in his crease and defends towards point by opening the face of his bat
good length delivery angles across the left-hander, Tamim gets on to the front foot and drives the ball towards cover
Watson bowls the slower one outside off stump, Tamim spots it early, waits in his crease, and dabs the ball towards third man
defended on the back foot to cover

and the fielder at short cover has taken the catch! Reza leans forward and drives a good length ball in the air towards short cover, David Hussey dives forward and takes a low catch inches off the ground, Reza hangs around for a bit perhaps wondering if the catch was clean but umpire Parker gives him out
full ball on middle and off, Razzak defends back to the bowler
banged in short by Watson, Razzak ducks under it
full ball on off stump, Tamim drives off the front foot towards long off to bring up the 100
tight line and length on middle and off, Razzak moves forward and defends with a straight bat
Hopes bowls a slower ball full on leg and middle, Razzak leans forward and flicks the ball through midwicket
Hopes pitches the ball outside off stump and slants it across the left-hander, Razzak lets it go through to Haddin
Razzak watches the ball slant past him once again
Hopes bowls a short ball but it's down leg side, that's a wide
this time the short ball is supremely directed, it pitches in line with the stumps and slants across the left-hander, Razzak just about drops his wrists in time

that's the end of Tamim! He was running out of partners and so he decided to uppercut a short and wide ball outside off stump, he got a top edge that flew high in the air and towards third man, Clark ran in from the boundary and took a well-judged catch, and with that Bangladesh's fading challenge has come to an end ...
Razzak moves on to the front foot and defends a good length ball towards cover
Watson bowls a bouncer and Razzak ducks under it
a good length ball slants across the left-hander, Razzak lets it go
tight line and length around off stump, Razzak moves forward and plays the ball towards cover
Razzak moves forward and flicks a length delivery off his pads towards long leg for a single
full delivery angling into middle stump, Razzak moves across and tickles the ball off his pads towards fine leg
good length from Bracken on middle and off, Mortaza moves forward and defends on the leg side
the slower ball on middle stump, Mortaza stays in his crease and defends towards the bowler
defended on the front foot towards the fielder at cover
tight line and length on middle stump, Mortaza gets on to the front foot and defends towards the bowler
short of a length outside off stump, Mortaza moves forward and drives on the up towards cover, he can't beat the infield
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Razzak strides forward and defends a flat ball towards the bowler
that's high in the air but safe! Razzak cleared his front foot out of the way an slogged across the line, he got a big top edge which flew high in the air but fell safely at long-on
driven towards short cover
that's driven hard towards short cover where Hussey - Michael - makes an excellent save
full toss on the pads, flicked behind square for a single
Bracken keeps it on a tight length just outside off stump, Razzak moves forward and defends
Razzak fends outside off stump but gets beaten by Bracken's change of pace, that was much slower, Haddin fails to collect as well and the batsmen run byes
good length from Bracken on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Razzak moves forward and fends at a short of a length delivery outside off stump, that's a quicker one and Bracken beats the bat
Razzak gets on to the front foot and plays the ball gently towards the leg side
Razzak strides forward and defends with a straight bat towards the bowler
tossed up on middle stump, Mortaza drives the ball past the bowler for a single
Razzak nudges the ball towards point and wants the single, the fielder rushes from slip towards the ball and prevents the single
played off the pads behind square for a single
defended towards midwicket
full ball outside off stump, Mortaza stands in his crease and drives the ball hard through extra cover, Johnson gives chase but won't catch it
Mortaza leans forward and nudges a flat ball towards midwicket
Bracken bowls the slower one full on leg and middle, Mortaza nudges the ball off his pads behind square
Bracken pitches the ball on a good length outside off and skids it through, Razzak moves forward and lets it go
Razzak moves towards the off stump and drives the ball with the angle into him towards mid-on
Bracken lands the ball just outside off and angles it into the left-hander, Razzak defends on the front foot with a straight bat
he's whacked that! Razzak picks the slower ball, moves his front foot out of the way, and swings his bat hard to dispatch the ball over wide long-on
Bracken replies with the bouncer, Razzak ducks
Mortaza moves forward and pushes a flat delivery into the gap at cover point
Razzak waits in his crease and defends on the leg side
bowled flat and straight by Hussey, Razzak defends on the front foot
Razzak moves forward and drives towards cover but can't find the gap

the quicker one has done the trick! Hussey fires in the flat and fast one, and angles it into the left-hander, Razzak is beaten for pace and the ball skids past his defences and hits off stump, that's Hussey's first one-day international wicket
